main event: On December 19, 1957, in Hondo, Texas, a UFO sighting occurred. The observation involved a ground radar sighting of a cigar-shaped object, approximately the size of half a dollar, moving at high speeds before sharply stopping and disappearing down the road.
interesting points: The object was described as moving slowly from right to left at about 1000 miles per hour.
After stopping sharply, it moved rapidly down the road and disappeared.
The witness noted a glowing trail associated with the object.
The conclusion of the report indicated that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
